title: Drawing, "Seven Studies of Irises", early 20th century
medium: graphite, pen and ink, brush and watercolor on yellow tracing paper
signed: Signed bottom left next to iris stem: S.L Crownfield
inscribed: Inscribed at top in black ink: No. 17
provenance: Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney
creditline: Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney
description: Seven studies of irises in various stages of blooming. Three of the designs are colored in with purple, green, yellow and red watercolor.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Seven Studies of Irises", early 20th century.
early 20th century. graphite, pen and ink, brush and watercolor on yellow tracing paper. Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney. 1937-59-38.
